```{r GDP from Portugal, France, Hungary, Slovakia and Denmark}
data<- read.csv("nama_10r_3gdp__custom_3521535_page_linear.csv")
head(data)
```
```{r}

data_geo <- data[data$isocode == "DK",]
```

```{r}
data_geo <- cbind (data_geo, "DK" = data_geo$rgdpe / data_geo$pop) 
ggplot (data_geo, 
        aes (x = time_period, y = OBS_value)) +
    geom_line ()
```
